ComicInfo.Title: Zarathos
ComicInfo.Series: Ghost Rider / Blaze: Spirits of Vengeance
ComicInfo.Summary: Zarathos: Zarathos defeats Blaze, Ghost Rider, Vengeance and Caretaker. Caretaker and the others pick up Mrs. Ketch and retreat to The Nightclub. Caretaker continues to reveal to Blaze, Dan Ketch and Michael Badilino their heritage. Lilith tries to convince Zarathos that she is his mother. Caretaker takes John, Ghost Rider and Vengeance to fight Zarathos and Ghost Rider manages to defeat him when he taps into the Medallion of Power. Zarathos, Lilith, Pilgrim and Nakota are drawn away into another dimension. Caretaker reveals that John Blaze and Dan Ketch are brothers.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-22 12:11:13. [CVDB66534] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:45:22. [Issue ID 85608]
ComicInfo.Characters: Francis Ketch,Nakota],Clara Menninger,Pilgrim,Centurious,Seer,Kodiak,Wolf,Zarathos,Mephisto (flashback),Lilin [Lilith,Vengeance [Michael Badilino],Ghost Rider [Danny Ketch],Caretaker,Johnny Blaze,Barbara Ketch (flashback),Miranda Woods
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
